title: Organ donation rate in the United Kingdom 2018/19 , by country
yAxis: Rate of donation per million population
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Rate of donation per million population in the y axis.
The Rate of donation per million population is appeared to be the highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
There is a difference of 12.8 between the maximum Country Wales and minimum Country Scotland.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Rate of donation per million population in the y axis.
The Rate of donation per million population is appeared to be the highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Rate of donation per million population in the y axis.
The Rate of donation per million population is appeared to be the highest at Country Wales and lowest at Country Scotland.
There is a difference of 12.8 between the maximum Country Wales and minimum Country Scotland.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Rate of donation per million population in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Rate of donation per million population 30.7 is found at Country Wales and the minimum is found at Scotland where Country is 17.9.
The maximum Country Wales has got 1.72 times higher Rate of donation per million population than the minimum Country Scotland.
The Country Wales has the highest Rate of donation per million population, followed by England, and Northern Ireland. Down to the Country Scotland which is the lowest.
The lowest value 17.9 at Scotland is almost 1.28 times smaller than the average value 24.03.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 96.1.
